amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Office of the Assistant Secretary for Civil Rights, Departmental Administration, Hispanic-Serving Institutions, and Outreach for Socially Disadvantaged Farmers with offsets of $8.6 million from the Common Computing Environment account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase, by transfer, the funds for the office of civil rights, research and education activities, and outreach by $8.6 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ballance amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Ballance.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ballance amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
